entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
